title: Dan Patrick Podcasts Presents : Two Guys from Hollywood Interview with Hector Berellez
itunes:title: Dan Patrick Podcasts Presents : Two Guys from Hollywood Interview with Hector Berellez
description:
Join Alan and Joey as they discuss their weeks, the vaccine, DiGiorno pizza and everything in between. Joining their conversation this week is a highly decorated and retired DEA Agent - Hector Berrellez. You may not know him by name, but we’re sure you’ve heard of the hit Netflix series NARCOS:MEXICO! The series follows DEA Agent Kiki Camarena as he goes undercover and eventually wipes out one of the largest marijuana plantations in history...or so we have been led to believe.http://podcasts.iheartradio.com/twoguys

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
